mapper.insert:
select seq_board.nextval from dual
insert into spring_board(bno,title,content,writer) values(#{bno},#{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.update: update spring_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updatedate=sysdate where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select * from spring_board where bno>0 order by bno desc
